title.rendered: Scientists unveil discovery of protein that slows aging – MM News

content.rendered:
1. Scientists unveil discovery of protein that slows aging  MM News
  2. Scientists Splice Material From Creature That Can Survive Outer Space Into Human Cells  Futurism
  3. Scientists may have found the key to slowing down ageing – thanks to tardigrades  The Independent
  4. Tardigrade proteins could slow aging in humans, small cell study finds  Livescience.com
  5. Tardigrade proteins upgrade damage resistance of human cells  New Atlas
